item.title: About
item.description: I am a theoretical physicist at the Kavli Institute for Theoretical Sciences, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences. My work centers on the study of nonequilibrium physics of angular momentum across various scales, achieved through collaboration with both theorists and experimentalists in diverse fields.

item.title: Study
item.description:
We are working on nonequilibrium quantum dynamics mediated by angular momenta, such as

  • gyromagnetic effect,
  • spin-valley transort.
